article_text: It’s pretty clear that the implementation of Obamacare will set the tone for how Americans think about government for years to come. There are two large questions to be settled, which you might call the questions of competence and coercion.

article_summary:
There are two large questions to be settled, which you might call the questions of competence and coercion.
It’s pretty clear that the implementation of Obamacare will set the tone for how Americans think about government for years to come.
